title: This 7-hour cosmic explosion is the longest gamma-ray burst ever seen. Could it be from an elusive class of black hole?
description: "This is certainly an outburst unlike any other we've seen in the past 50 years."
content: "This is certainly an outburst unlike any other we've seen in the past 50 years."
